â
* In the [[Nintendo DS]] game [[Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney]] there is a fictional show called the Steel Samurai with the tagline "For great justice".
  â
* Saying one of the game lines to the Instant Messenger bot [[SmarterChild]] will make it reply with another game line. E.g. saying "Somebody set up us the bomb" will cause SmarterChild to reply with "We get signal" or "Main screen turn on".
  â
*In the Computer Game [[Warcraft 3: Reign of Choas]] and in the expansion pack [[ Warcraft 3: The Frozen Throne]] typing in allyourbasearebelongtous like so without any spacing on single player will result in the map instantly ending with your victory.
